title: Google\Cloud\Iap\V1\CsmSettings
name: CsmSettings
description:
Configuration for RCTokens generated for CSM workloads protected by IAP.

RCTokens are IAP generated JWTs that can be verified at the application. The RCToken is primarily used for ISTIO deployments, and can be scoped to a single mesh by configuring the audience field accordingly

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.iap.v1.CsmSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.rctoken_aud
params.description: Audience claim set in the generated RCToken. This value is not validated by IAP.
